name: 5.56x45mm AP
description: Advanced Armor Piercing round with depleted uranium core. Excellent penetration at the cost of reduced damage output.
notes: Top-tier armor piercing ammunition with depleted uranium core. Maximum penetration available for 5.56mm.
tips: The ultimate anti-armor round. Very expensive but can penetrate the heaviest protection. Save for the toughest opponents.

name: 5.56x45mm M995
description: Armor Piercing ammunition with tungsten core designed to penetrate body armor. Lower damage but excellent penetration capabilities.
notes: High-performance armor piercing round with tungsten core. Effective against armored targets.
tips: Best choice against heavily armored opponents. Higher cost but superior penetration makes it worth the investment for tough encounters.

name: 5.56x45mm Mk318
description: Tracer ammunition with visible trajectory for target correction. Balanced performance with tracer visibility.
notes: Hollow point design maximizes damage against unarmored targets. Poor performance against body armor.
tips: Excellent for hunting unarmored targets or dealing maximum damage to flesh. Avoid using against armored opponents.

name: 5.56x45mm FMJ
description: Full Metal Jacket ammunition for 5.56x45mm NATO rifles. Standard military round offering good balance of damage and penetration.
notes: Standard NATO ammunition compatible with most 5.56mm rifles. Reliable performance with moderate armor penetration.
tips: Good all-around ammunition for medium-range engagements. Cost-effective choice for budget loadouts while maintaining decent stopping power.

name: 5.56x45mm Mk255
description: Hollow Point ammunition designed for maximum tissue damage. High damage output but poor armor penetration.
notes: Tracer round with visible flight path. Useful for target correction and marking targets for teammates.
tips: Great for adjusting aim and marking targets, but visible trajectory can reveal your position. Use strategically.

name: 7.62x39mm AP
description: Advanced Armor Piercing round with tungsten carbide core. Maximum penetration available for 7.62x39mm cartridge.
notes: Top-tier armor piercing ammunition with tungsten carbide core. Maximum penetration for 7.62x39mm platform.
tips: The ultimate anti-armor round for AK rifles. Extremely expensive but can defeat the heaviest armor protection.

name: 7.62x39mm BP
description: Armor Piercing ammunition with hardened steel core. Excellent penetration capabilities against body armor while maintaining good damage output.
notes: High-quality armor piercing round with steel core. Excellent balance of damage and penetration for AK platforms.
tips: Ideal for engaging armored targets. Higher penetration than PS rounds while maintaining good damage output.

name: 7.62x39mm PS
description: Standard Full Metal Jacket military ammunition. Reliable performance with good damage and moderate penetration capabilities.
notes: Standard Soviet military ammunition. Reliable performance with good damage output for general combat use.
tips: Excellent all-around ammunition for AK rifles. Good damage and cost-effective for most combat situations.

name: 7.62x39mm FMJ Tracer
description: Full Metal Jacket tracer ammunition with visible trajectory. Good balance of damage and penetration with tracer visibility.
notes: Tracer round with visible flight path for target correction. Good balance of damage and penetration.
tips: Useful for spotting shots and target marking. Visible trajectory helps with long-range engagements but can reveal position.

name: 7.62x39mm SP
description: Soft Point hunting ammunition designed for maximum expansion. High damage against unarmored targets but poor armor penetration.
notes: Soft point hunting ammunition with excellent expansion properties. Maximum damage against unarmored targets.
tips: Perfect for hunting or engaging unarmored enemies. High bleeding chance but ineffective against body armor.

name: 7.62x51mm M993
description: Advanced Armor Piercing round with depleted uranium core. Maximum penetration available for 7.62x51mm NATO platform.
notes: Ultimate armor piercing ammunition with depleted uranium core. Capable of defeating any body armor in the field.
tips: The most expensive and effective anti-armor round available. Reserve for the most heavily protected targets.

name: 7.62x51mm M61
description: Armor Piercing ammunition with tungsten core designed for maximum penetration. Military-grade anti-armor round for battle rifles.
notes: High-performance armor piercing round with tungsten core. Excellent penetration against body armor and vehicles.
tips: Premier choice for engaging heavily armored targets. Expensive but extremely effective against high-tier protection.

name: 7.62x51mm M80
description: Full Metal Jacket with better penetration. Good damage and better penetration.
notes: Tracer round with visible flight path for long-range target correction. Good balance of damage and penetration.
tips: Excellent for long-range engagements where you need to see bullet trajectory. Helps with range estimation and target marking.

name: 7.62x51mm FMG
description: Standard NATO Full Metal Jacket ammunition. Reliable military-grade round with excellent damage and moderate penetration.
notes: Standard NATO military ammunition used by Western forces. Excellent damage output with reliable performance.
tips: Outstanding all-around ammunition for battle rifles. High damage makes it effective against most targets.

name: 7.62x51mm SP
description: Soft Point hunting ammunition designed for maximum tissue damage. Devastating against unarmored targets but poor armor penetration.
notes: Hunting ammunition with soft point design for maximum expansion. Devastating damage against unarmored targets.
tips: Highest damage output for 7.62x51mm. Excellent for hunting or engaging unarmored enemies. Very high bleeding chance.

name: 9x19mm AP
description: Armor Piercing pistol ammunition with hardened steel core. Designed to penetrate body armor at close range.
notes: Specialized armor piercing pistol round with hardened steel core. Effective against light body armor at close range.
tips: Best pistol round for penetrating armor. Expensive but necessary when facing armored opponents with sidearms.

name: 9x19mm PST Tracer
description: Tracer pistol ammunition with visible trajectory. Moderate damage and penetration with tracer visibility for target correction.
notes: Tracer round with visible flight path for pistols. Useful for target correction and marking at close to medium range.
tips: Good for training and target marking. The visible trajectory helps with shot placement but can reveal your position.

name: 9x19mm FMJ
description: Standard Full Metal Jacket pistol ammunition. Reliable military and law enforcement round with good penetration.
notes: Standard military and police ammunition. Reliable performance with good damage and moderate penetration.
tips: Most cost-effective pistol ammunition. Good all-around performance for general use and training.

name: 9x19mm PSO
description: Hollow Point ammunition designed for maximum expansion and stopping power. High damage but minimal armor penetration.
notes: Hollow point design for maximum tissue damage and stopping power. Excellent against unarmored targets.
tips: Highest damage pistol round against unarmored targets. High bleeding chance makes it very effective for self-defense.

name: 5.45x39mm BS
description: Armor Piercing ammunition with hardened steel core. High penetration capabilities against body armor with good damage retention.
notes: Elite military ammunition with tungsten carbide core. Designed to defeat modern body armor at extended ranges.
tips: The ultimate armor-piercing round for AK-74 platform. Expensive but essential for engaging heavily armored targets.

name: 5.45x39mm 7N40
description: Advanced Armor Piercing ammunition with tungsten carbide core. Top-tier penetration for 5.45x39mm platform with excellent armor-defeating capabilities.
notes: High-quality armor piercing round with steel core. Excellent balance of penetration and damage for AK-74 platforms.
tips: Premium choice for engaging armored targets. More affordable than 7N40 while still providing excellent armor penetration.

name: 5.45x39mm PP Tracer
description: Tracer ammunition with visible trajectory and moderate armor penetration. Good for target correction and marking enemies.
notes: Tracer round with visible flight path and good penetration. Useful for target correction and squad coordination.
tips: Excellent for long-range engagements where you need to see bullet trajectory. Good penetration makes it versatile.

name: 5.45x39mm FMJ
description: Standard Full Metal Jacket military ammunition. Reliable performance with good damage and moderate penetration for general use.
notes: Standard Soviet military ammunition for AK-74 platform. Reliable performance with good damage output for general combat.
tips: Most cost-effective ammunition for AK-74 rifles. Good balance of damage and affordability for regular use.

name: 5.45x39mm PRS
description: Hollow Point ammunition designed for maximum tissue damage. High damage against unarmored targets but poor armor penetration.
notes: Hollow point design for maximum expansion and tissue damage. Excellent against unarmored targets with high bleeding chance.
tips: Highest damage 5.45x39mm round against unarmored enemies. Very effective for hunting or anti-personnel use.

name: .45 ACP AP
description: Armor Piercing pistol ammunition with hardened steel core. Designed to penetrate light body armor at close range with heavy .45 caliber power.
notes: Heavy armor piercing pistol round with excellent stopping power. Steel core provides good penetration for a pistol cartridge.
tips: Best .45 ACP round for penetrating armor. Expensive but necessary when facing armored opponents with large-caliber sidearms.

name: .45 ACP L-Match Tracer
description: Match-grade tracer ammunition with visible trajectory. Accurate long-range performance with tracer visibility for target correction.
notes: Match-grade tracer round with enhanced accuracy. Visible flight path helps with long-range pistol shooting.
tips: Excellent for precision shooting and target marking. The visible trajectory aids in range estimation and follow-up shots.

name: .45 ACP FMJ
description: Standard Full Metal Jacket ammunition. Classic .45 ACP military round with excellent stopping power and reliable performance.
notes: Classic military .45 ACP ammunition. Time-tested design with excellent stopping power and reliable feeding.
tips: The standard choice for .45 ACP weapons. High damage and proven reliability make it excellent for general use.

name: .45 ACP Tracer
description: Standard tracer ammunition with visible trajectory. Lower velocity but excellent visibility for target correction and spotting.
notes: Standard tracer round with bright visible trajectory. Good for target spotting and correction in low-light conditions.
tips: Useful for night operations and target marking. The bright tracer helps teammates identify targets but reveals your position.

name: 12 Gauge AP-20 Slug
description: Armor Piercing slug with hardened core designed to penetrate body armor. Maximum penetration available for shotgun ammunition.
notes: Specialized armor-piercing slug with hardened core. Devastating damage with good armor penetration for close-range combat.
tips: Ultimate close-quarters anti-armor round. Extremely expensive but can defeat body armor while delivering massive damage.

name: 12 Gauge Flechette
description: Armor Piercing buckshot with hardened pellets. Multiple projectiles with enhanced penetration against light armor.
notes: Armor-piercing buckshot with hardened pellets. Multiple projectiles provide good armor penetration with spread pattern.
tips: Effective against lightly armored targets at close range. Multiple pellets increase hit probability but reduce individual damage.

name: 12 Gauge Buckshot
description: Standard buckshot with 7mm pellets. Classic shotgun ammunition with devastating close-range stopping power.
notes: Standard buckshot with multiple 7mm pellets. Classic shotgun round with devastating close-range effectiveness.
tips: Most cost-effective shotgun ammunition. Excellent stopping power at close range but limited armor penetration.

name: 12 Gauge RIP slug
description: Hollow Point slug designed for maximum tissue damage. Devastating stopping power against unarmored targets.
notes: Massive hollow point slug for maximum tissue damage. Highest damage output but poor armor penetration.
tips: Ultimate stopping power against unarmored targets. Extremely high bleeding chance makes it devastating for hunting or anti-personnel use.

name: 7.62x54R SNB
description: Advanced Armor Piercing ammunition with tungsten carbide core. Maximum penetration available for the venerable 7.62x54R cartridge.
notes: Elite sniper ammunition with tungsten carbide core. Designed to defeat the heaviest body armor at extreme ranges.
tips: The ultimate long-range armor-piercing round. Extremely expensive but can penetrate any armor while maintaining excellent damage.

name: 7.62x54R LPS
description: Armor Piercing ammunition with hardened steel core. High penetration capabilities against body armor with good damage retention.
notes: High-quality armor piercing round with steel core. Excellent long-range performance for sniper rifles and machine guns.
tips: Premium choice for engaging armored targets at long range. Good balance of penetration and damage for precision shooting.

name: 7.62x54R Ps Tracer
description: Tracer ammunition with visible trajectory and moderate armor penetration. Excellent for long-range target correction and marking.
notes: Tracer round with visible flight path and good penetration. Excellent for long-range target correction and spotting.
tips: Perfect for precision shooting at extended ranges. The visible trajectory helps with range estimation and target marking.

name: 7.62x54R FMJ
description: Standard Full Metal Jacket military ammunition. Reliable performance with excellent damage and moderate penetration for general use.
notes: Standard Russian military ammunition for machine guns and sniper rifles. Reliable performance with excellent damage output.
tips: Most cost-effective 7.62x54R ammunition. Excellent damage makes it effective against most targets at long range.

name: 7.62x54R HP
description: Hollow Point ammunition designed for maximum expansion and tissue damage. Devastating against unarmored targets at long range.
notes: Hollow point design for maximum expansion and tissue damage. Excellent long-range hunting ammunition with devastating effects.
tips: Highest damage 7.62x54R round against unarmored targets. Extremely high bleeding chance makes it lethal for precision shooting.

name: 6.8x51mm AP
description: Armor Piercing ammunition with advanced tungsten core. Cutting-edge military round designed for next-generation weapon systems.
notes: Advanced armor piercing round with tungsten core for next-generation weapon systems. Excellent balance of damage and penetration.
tips: Premium armor-piercing round for modern assault rifles. Expensive but highly effective against armored targets at all ranges.

description: Standard Full Metal Jacket ammunition for next-generation military rifles. Modern cartridge with excellent long-range performance.
